GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article with the specified id, including the comment count

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves comments with the specified article_id

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a comment for the specified article_id.

request body.username: string - the username of the user posting the comment
request body.body: string - the content of the comment

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the votes on the specified article by the given amount

request body.inc_votes: number - indicates how much the votes property should be updated by

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

possibleErrors.404: Comment not found - if comment_id does not exist
possibleErrors.400: Bad request - if comment_id is invalid (e.g. not a number)

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
